Package edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.sensor

Provides particle filter interface implementations for Wifi and GSM localization

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RSSICalibrateProvider<P extends Particle> Interface for a source of signal strength samples derived at calibration time (as opposed to localization time)
RSSIRuntimeProvider Interface for a source of signal strength samples derived at localization time (as opposed to calibration time)
 

Class Summary
Accelerometer Helper for initializing the accelerometer sensors and feeding readings to an AccelerometerListener
AccelerometerCallback  
ConstantRSSIRuntimeProvider dummy provider used for testing particle filter algorithm
CorrelatedSignalValues  
DistanceToPointComparator  
GSMData  
GsmSignalMapRSSICalibrateProvider Stores a map of GSM signal strengths over space, which can be queried for the signal strengths expected at any point.
GSMSignalMapRSSICalibrateProviderKNN Stores a map of GSM signal strengths over space, which can be queried for the signal strengths expected at any point.
GyroCalibrationDataProvider Manages calibration data for gyro sensors
GyroCallback  
Gyroscope Helper for initializing the gyroscope sensors and feeding readings to a GyroListener
LogPlaybackDeadReckoningGaussianUpdater  
LogPlaybackGSMRSSIRuntimeProvider Simulate real-time localization by playing back a pre-recorded sequence of GSM signal strength readings
LogPlaybackTimeSource  
LogPlaybackWifiRSSIRuntimeProvider Simulate real-time localization by playing back a pre-recorded sequence of wifi signal strength readings
Magnetometer Helper for initializing the magnetometer sensors and feeding readings to a MagnetometerListener
MagnetometerCallback  
MapConstrainedRSSIMeasurer2D<P extends Particle2D> Extension of RSSIMeasurer which kills particles that are out of bounds on the map by setting their weights to 0.
MapConstrainMeasurer<P extends Particle2D> Extension of RSSIMeasurer which kills particles that are out of bounds on the map by setting their weights to 0.
RawSensorLogPlayback  
RSSIDistanceMetric Compares RSSI measurements for similarity Properties of the metric are that any measurements with beacons in common will be closer than completely disjoint measurements The number of beacons in common is the primary measure of similarity, with correspondence in values as a secondary factor
RSSIDistanceMetricTrivial Compares RSSI measurements for similarity Just looks at the number of beacons in common
RSSIDistanceMetricTrivial2 Compares RSSI measurements for similarity Looks at the number of beacons in common and penalizes for extra beacons
RSSIMeasurer<P extends Particle> Updates probability of particles based on new signal strength readings
RSSIReading Data structure for holding signal strength readings that is agnostic to source (either Wifi or GSM)
SensorReading Generic format for accelerometer, magnetometer, gyro, etc.
TestingRSSICalibrateProvider dummy provider of RSSI calibration data
WifiData  
WifiSignalMapRSSICalibrateProvider Stores a map of wifi signal strengths over space, which can be queried for the signal strengths expected at any point.
WifiSignalMapRSSICalibrateProviderKNN Stores a map of wifi signal strengths over space, which can be queried for the signal strengths expected at any point.

Package edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.sensor Description

Provides particle filter interface implementations for Wifi and GSM localization
